name: MoonBlight
description:
>Made in 48 Hours for the University of  Utah's March 2022 Game Jam<

Epilepsy Warning: Flashing lights!!!

The Moon Goddess has been struck with a terrible illness, leaving her twisted and violent.  Her vicious rampage knocked the celestial cycle off balance, plunging the world into darkness.

For years, you have served faithfully as the goddess's acolyte - but now, you must stand against her. Can you survive the frenzied assault and shine your healing light on the Moon, restoring order to the world? Or will you fall, same as all before you..?

===========
